did.unittitle: Office of Institutional Research, Planning and Effectiveness Records

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: State University of New York at Albany. Office of Institutional Research

did.abstract: Contains studies and reports on the State University of New York at Albany based on research conducted by the Office of Institutional Research.
did.physloc: The materials are located onsite in the department.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is unrestricted.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: This page may contain links to digital objects. Access to these images and the technical capacity to download them does not imply permission for re-use. Digital objects may be used freely for personal reference use, referred to, or linked to from other web sites.
Researchers do not have permission to publish or disseminate material from these collections without permission from an archivist and/or the copyright holder.

The researcher assumes full responsibility for conforming to the laws of copyright. Some materials in these collections may be protected by the U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) and/or by the copyright or neighboring-rights laws of other nations. More information about U.S. Copyright is provided by the Copyright Office. Additionally, re-use may be restricted by terms of University Libraries gift or purchase agreements, donor restrictions, privacy and publicity rights, licensing and trademarks.
The University Archives are eager to hear from any copyright owners who are not properly identified so that appropriate information may be provided in the future.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: All items in this collection were transferred to the University Libraries, M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Office of Institutional Research, Planning and Effectiveness is a major source of official data and statistics about the University. The Office has been a key developer of campus enrollment and revenue projections, especially concentrating on undergraduate admissions and financial aid databases. The Office also conducts special studies and databased analyses which measure organizational effectiveness and which support campus management.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Reports and Presentations series of this collection documents the day-to-day work done by the Office. It includes studies and reports completed by the Office on topics including faculty workload and salary; enrollment figures, goals and projections; tuition and student charges; degrees awarded; five year planning background documentation and outcome assessments. This series also includes both internal office correspondence and correspondence with a number of other offices and departments within the university. This collection also contains a series of outcome assessments and correspondence documenting the work done by the Office of Assessment, a subsidiary within the Office of Institutional Research. Finally, this collection includes a series of web crawls of the Officeâ€™s website.

arrangement.head: Arrangement of the Collection
arrangement.p: Collection was maintained in the original order after it was transferred.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows:

Identification of specific item, series, box, folder, Office of Institutional Research Records, Planning and Effectiveness, 1929-1994. M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives, University Libraries, University at Albany, State University of New York (hereafter referred to as the Office of Institutional Research Records).

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Series was maintained in the original order after it was transferred.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Loose papers in each box were foldered in the order that they were found. Work orders, telephone service request forms, allocation transfers and similar routine paperwork no longer in retention removed in 2018 by Miles Lawlor.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains a number of files documenting the activities of the Office of Institutional Research. This includes university profiles, and prepared presentations and reports on a number of different topics including staff salaries, staff workload analyses, enrollment projections, degree awarding trends, five year plans, student outcome assessments and the Student Information Retrieval System (SIRS) implemented in the 1980s. This series also includes departmental correspondence interspersed throughout.

did.unittitle: Wendell Lorang Space Management Committee Records

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Collection was maintained in the original order after it was transferred.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series is made up of documents collected and created by Wendell Lorang, Associate Director of Institutional Research and Chair of the Space Management Committee. The documents in this series include correspondence, memoranda regarding space allocations, renovation and alteration requests, classroom move requests, and committee meeting minutes.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Series was maintained in its original order after it was transferred.

scopecontent.head: Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains outcome assessment reports, example surveys to be furnished to students, and departmental self-studies on how best to measure student success in a given major.
